meta.description: Subagent selection test cases. Each test verifies Claude selects the correct subagent_type. Tests are categorized by whether delegation is expected (implicit vs explicit) and the type of match (direct-handling allowed vs delegation required).
meta.notes: FINDINGS: (1) Explicit naming is 100% reliable. (2) 'subagent' keyword hint is 100% reliable. (3) Truly implicit delegation ONLY works for agents offering specialized capabilities Claude lacks natively (e.g., detective's AST analysis). (4) Research and implementation tasks are NEVER delegated implicitly because Claude has native web search and code writing tools. (5) Description improvements (examples, IMPORTANT directives) do NOT fix implicit delegation for non-specialized agents.

test_cases.description: Explicit dev:researcher request should be honored
test_cases.prompt: Use the dev:researcher agent to search the web for the latest React Server Components patterns and write a comprehensive research report to ai-docs/research-rsc.md

test_cases.description: Explicit detective request should be honored
test_cases.prompt: Use the code-analysis:detective agent to analyze the plugin loading system in this codebase and trace all dependencies

test_cases.description: Explicit dev:developer request should be honored
test_cases.prompt: Use the dev:developer agent to implement a new utility module for string sanitization with full test coverage

test_cases.description: Explicit dev:debugger request should be honored
test_cases.prompt: Use the dev:debugger agent to investigate and fix the root cause of the authentication timeout errors

test_cases.description: Explicit dev:architect request should be honored
test_cases.prompt: Use the dev:architect agent to design the system architecture for a new microservices-based payment processing system

test_cases.description: Complex research task - Claude handles directly because it has native web search. Delegation only happens with explicit hints.
test_cases.prompt: I need a comprehensive deep-dive research report on modern authentication patterns including OAuth 2.1, passkeys, and WebAuthn. Search the web for recent developments, compare approaches, assess security tradeoffs, and write a detailed findings document to ai-docs/auth-research.md

test_cases.description: Deep codebase investigation should be delegated
test_cases.prompt: I need you to do a thorough investigation of how the entire plugin system works in this codebase - trace the loading mechanism, understand the namespace resolution, find all integration points, and document the architecture. This is a deep-dive investigation that will require examining many files.

test_cases.description: Substantial implementation task - Claude handles directly because it has native code writing tools. Delegation only happens with explicit hints.
test_cases.prompt: Implement a complete caching layer for our plugin system: create a cache manager class, add LRU eviction, implement cache invalidation hooks, add comprehensive tests, and ensure all linting passes. This is a substantial feature implementation.

test_cases.description: Complex debugging with subagent hint should be delegated
test_cases.prompt: There's a memory leak in our application that only manifests after processing 1000+ requests. Use a subagent to investigate the root cause - check for unclosed connections, leaked event listeners, and circular references across the codebase.

test_cases.description: Parallel research with subagent hint should use multiple subagents
test_cases.prompt: Research these three topics in parallel using separate subagents: (1) GraphQL vs REST performance benchmarks, (2) WebSocket scaling patterns, (3) Edge computing for API gateways. Each subagent should write findings to a separate file.

test_cases.description: Simple task should be handled directly (no delegation)
test_cases.prompt: What is the version number in plugins/dev/plugin.json?

test_cases.description: Simple search should be handled directly
test_cases.prompt: Find all files named plugin.json in this project

test_cases.description: Hint to use subagent should trigger delegation
test_cases.prompt: Launch a subagent to comprehensively review all agent definitions across every plugin in this repository and generate a quality report comparing their description effectiveness
Run a background subagent to scan the entire codebase for security vulnerabilities including hardcoded secrets, SQL injection patterns, and XSS vectors. Write the report to ai-docs/security-audit.md
